name: Shelter the Flame
description:
A game made for ludum dare 46.  In this game it is your jobs to make sure to keep all three of the flames lit and not go out because of the rain.

CONTROLS-

A/D or arrow keys to move left and right

When touching the umbrella, hold Space to move it.

When near a flame make sure to press space to blow on it 

NOTES

Flames will always be decreasing but when they are rained on they will decrease more.

One of the three rain clouds will rain harder than others so be sure to see which one and move it around as necessary.
